revision.text: ==English== ===Proper noun=== {{en-prop}} # {{surname|en|from=Navajo}} primarily used by the [[Navajo]] people, probably a [[Appendix:Glossary#calque|calque]] of an existing Navajo name. ===Statistics=== * According to the 2010 United States Census, ''Yellowhorse'' is the 48,160<sup>th</sup> most common surname in the United States, belonging to 439 individuals. ''Yellowhorse'' is most common among American Indian/Alaska Native (88.38%) individuals. [[Category:English terms calqued from Navajo]]
